To good understand factor contribute variation , data incidence , management outcome OHCA require . Results may also potential support development quality benchmarking European Emergency Medical Services ( EMS ) . This prospective European study involve 27 different country . It provide common Utstein-based dataset , data collection methodology common data collection period participant , thereby potentially increase comparability . Study research question address follow : OHCA incidence different European region ; incidence cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) attempt ; initial presenting rhythm patient bystander EMS start CPR resuscitation intervention ; rate return spontaneous circulation ( ROSC ) ; patient status handover hospital i.e . ROSC , ongoing CPR , dead ; incidence patient still alive 30 day OHCA ; incidence patient discharge alive hospital .
